trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

trans-unit.resname: PRM·72219 | Time Wipe | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.
trans-unit.target: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.

trans-unit.resname: PRM·72221 | Liliana's Triumph | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, each opponent also discards a card.
trans-unit.target: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, each opponent also discards a card.
